title: Implement Service Creation and Management Features
description: Develop comprehensive service management functionality including service creation, editing, categorization, and media upload capabilities for service providers.

effort_estimate.justification: Implementing comprehensive service management requires developing multiple CRUD operations, validation logic, categorization features, and media handling capabilities for service providers.

user_stories: As a service provider, I want to create detailed service listings so that customers can understand what I offer
As a service provider, I need to organize services into categories so that customers can easily find them
As a service provider, I want to add media to services so that customers can visualize what I provide
business_rules: Services must be created with proper validation of required fields
Service descriptions must meet minimum length requirements
Service categories must be properly assigned and validated
Media uploads must be validated for file types and sizes
Service pricing must follow defined validation rules
edge_cases: Handling service creation with invalid data
Managing service updates with conflicting information
Processing service deletion with associated bookings
Validating media uploads for security and file type compliance
Managing service categories with hierarchical relationships

acceptance_criteria: Service creation API endpoint implemented with validation
Service categorization system supports hierarchical categories
Media upload functionality for service images/videos
Service listing and retrieval by category works
Service deletion properly handles dependent data
All service operations are secured with proper authentication

blocking_information.blocking_reason: Basic CRUD operations must be implemented first to provide foundation for service management

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement the service management features as defined in FR-1.1 to FR-1.4 of the BRD. Include proper validation for service descriptions and media uploads. Support hierarchical service categories as mentioned in FR-1.3.
additional_context.design_references: Service management requirements from BRD and service creation journey from User Journeys
additional_context.security_considerations: Implement strict validation and sanitization for service descriptions and media uploads to prevent XSS and other attacks
